description: After an easy Easter brunch dish? Try this French toast recipe using Chocolate hot cross buns, then simply top with berries and melted white chocolate.
keywords: Chocolate Hot Cross Bun French Toast
name: Chocolate Hot Cross Bun French Toast Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Split each bun in half and arrange on plates. Top with strawberries and drizzle with chocolate. Dust with icing sugar and serve.
